testcase.classname: Check Login functionality of Orange Hrm Application
testcase.name: A) User login to Orange Hrm Application with valid credentials
testcase.system-out: Given User is on Login page of Orange Hrm application.......................passed When User enters correct username as "admin" and password as "admin"........passed And Click on Login button...................................................passed Then User should login successfully.........................................passed

testcase.classname: Check Login functionality of Orange Hrm Application
testcase.name: B) User login to Orange Hrm Application with invalid credentials
testcase.system-out: Given User is on Login page of Orange Hrm application.......................passed When User enters incorrect username as "admin2" and password as "admin02"...passed And Click on Login button...................................................passed Then User should get an error message is as "Invalid Login".................passed

testcase.classname: Check Login functionality of Orange Hrm Application
testcase.name: C) Logout from Orange Hrm Application
testcase.system-out: Given User is on home page of Orange Hrm application........................passed When User clicks on Logout button...........................................passed Then User should logout successfully........................................passed
